评论详情: It’s light waterproof and minimal way to use it’s very straight forward

The wallet is super lightweight but still durable, perfect for everyday use. It holds all my cards and cash without feeling bulky, and the material feels high-quality and built to last. If you’re looking for a simple, modern wallet that’s compact yet efficient, this is a great choice. Highly recommend for anyone who wants something practical with a clean, stylish look!

My previous wallet was of a similar material and construction, and it was the longest lasting wallet i have ever owned (I'm 74). It was hard to locate one like this, but I expect similar performance from this one.

评论概述: The Best Wallet I Have Ever Owned
评论详情: I am not a pair reviewer and I did not receive this for free to review it. This little Magpul wallet is the best thing to happen to wallets ever. It is slim, tough and it stores all of the necessary cards and IDs very securely. I work as a Construction Estimator and this wallet has held up very well under my active lifestyle. I have recommended this wallet to many of my male friends who spend a lot of time outdoors for work or who fish and hunt a lot like I do. I was looking at the wallet the other day and it literally looks exactly like it did when I purchased it many years ago. The biggest advantage is that it lays very flat and does not make a big bulge in you back pocket.  I highly recommend this wallet - I am 50 years old and it is the best one I have ever found.

评论概述: Slim design. Holds more than you would think.
评论详情: I'm not nice to the things I buy. This wallet lasted me 5 years and one month to the day. Bought again without hesitation.  After 5 years the money and card part separated and are now two separate pieces.

As a minimalist I absolutely love this wallet... got rid of my card-ejector minimalist for this wallet.  If you have a few cards (and don't keep your 80's concert ticket stubs) then you will love it.  I don't like to carry a ton of cash so mine stays folded, as the plastic wants to stay folded.  No problems in and out of my pocket as others have complained and it has held together perfectly (probably because I'm not trying to stuff it full).

评论概述: Great Wallet for when things are Moist
评论详情: I’ve used a magpul daka wallet in the past, although it was a front pocket one, and to be honest I wasn’t the biggest fan of it.  However, the main thing I liked about it was its resistance to moisture. So when I started traveling to tropical environments, I picked up this guy and have loved it.  The card slots are little tight, but I found that adding two cards to each slot will help stretch it out (giggity) making it easier to remove cards. The cash slot is something that is tight as well, but it does the job.  Typically I carry my ID, a debit card, a credit card, a wallet bottle opener tool, and few hundred pesos. The wallet keeps everything in place and held so closely together that you can still comfortably stick it in your front pocket

评论概述: I love the feel of this Product
评论详情: These Magpul Daka wallets are so premium feeling and a Joy to use everyday. They make you enjoy pulling them out to grab your cards or your cash. And the texture and feel of the surface is very satisfying to your mind. Definitely will be buying other Magpul Daka wallet variants in the future. I'm sold.

Really wanted this to work but 5 bills makes it not sit flat/close all the way. I have other DAKA and they are awesome. Construction of this seems fine but it’s just the very limited capacity it a big con for me. Will probably return.

Originally, I bought two wallets; one was going to be my primary wallet with all of my stuff in it and the second wallet, this one, was going to have minimal things in it whenever I needed to go to do outdoor type things... After switching back and forth a couple times I decided that this wallet could hold as much as I needed and just used this wallet all the time I was looking for something like the mighty wallet but with better longevity and I think this fit that bill.

评论概述: Hard to get money into it.
评论详情: I should have known a slightly rubberized wallet would be a pain to get paper into.  It held up over however long I've had it, but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
Very slim and perfect for edc , I love this wallet

This is the best wallet I’ve ever owned! It doesn’t fold flat initially, I had to carry it for a while before it flattened out. It’s thinner than all the “minimalist” metal wallets I’ve seen. It can hold about 8 cards and ten bills comfortable. More can be crammed in if needed, but then it doesn’t lay flat.
Loved how thin it is. No bulk when putting contents. Fits alot
Feels very well made, but had a simple design. Exactly what I was looking for!
It’s a nice wallet, and I like it, but they need to change the description of this item. It is not made in the USA. In my photo, this is the green and coyote wallets both say, made in China
The wallet won’t close if you have anything in the cash section. It has also started coming apart after 2 months.

Super slim and holds plenty of cards and cash. This is by far WAY thinner than any other wallet similarly sized. Durability should be great as I still haven’t worn out my card carrier version after 5 years of carry.

Needed a travel wallet for work that can take some abuse and I don't have to worry if I had to replace it.  This was as close as I get.  I need a card that doesn't block RFID, I travel for work and need 4-6 RFID access cards.  Much easier touching a side of a wallet to a door.  My current wallet can do 6 RFID cards with the interior flap, my next trip I'll test how well and many cards will work with this.  This looks like it will hold up for a year or two but the method they use to "weld" the material makes for wide seams.  This makes this wallet bigger then I thought I would be, pretty close to a normal bifold.  I think the Vaultskin and Distil Union are have wallets but they do cost more.This is an inexpensive wallet so I'm not going to say it's better then my faves (Stuart & Lau Slim,  Pioneer Flyfold and various Bellroys) but it's a solid buy for peanuts.

Things I like about the wallet: slim, sleek (doesn't stick to shorts pockets), holds enough cards and cash, comes in my favorite color.  Things I don't like about the wallet: doesn't stay shut with cash in it, edges are fraying after a couple weeks of use (not heavily, some very light strands, but noticeable), bit difficult to put cards in the single card slots when there are 3+ cards in the back slot.  For $20ish it isn't a bad deal at all, but it isn't a wallet that I'll be using for much longer due to needs and wants.
This is cheap rubber and totally overpriced. The insert slots are so tight it peeled the film off one of my cards. It's going back.

Wallet is of great material and feels very durable. Unfortunately when I added cash the wallet didn’t fully fold and would stay open I had to fold my bills and put them on only one side for it to close decently, mind you it was only two bills which you can see in the photos. Over all very minimal durable wallet that feels great to hold and use.

评论概述: Tacticool but Practical and simple design
评论详情: Will be ordering more but won’t see how it could replace my Secrid card protector, I was tired of finding “wallets” like the Dango, Muradin, Ridge among many others that prioritizes cards, when these days contactless payments is the norm. We still need wallets for coins and cash (paper money) and there’s not many options out there except the Belroys but they seem to be more for a posh market. Magpul is for people like us that look for 5.11 gear first but don’t want to scream for attention that we’re carrying. I will be ordering replacement Magpul DAKA products and hope they continue to expand on their EDC/travel concepts, I still use a Lewis and Clark Stash Wallet for coins.

评论概述: Love this wallet! Never going back.
评论详情: Thin, light, extremely tough, I have zero complaints with the design, durability or price.My only complaint isn't a fault of the wallet at all,  I wanted something slim and light to replace a bulky leather wallet.  For the first few months I kept panicking because I didn't feel it while walking or sitting and I was constantly thinking I forgot my wallet.  Now I have adjusted to it and can sit on it for long car rides without back pain and I don't have the "forgot wallet" feeling bothering me.

Alright, so I’m one of those guys that carries a big wallet with too much stuff. My jeans tend to have that rectangular fading on my front pocket. My last wallet was on its last legs and I decided to try this out. It definitely doesn’t hold as much but it’s a good balance. I can still carry cash, yes cash, remember that paper we used to use. Recently on a trip to Mexico, our cards were not working, and guess who saved the day with cash…that’s right! It saved our vacation that day. I think it looks tacticool and I can keep a lot of stuff in it. It’s practical for keeping receipts and it’s half as big as my last wallet. I’ve been using it for a couple of months now and it’s loosened up a bit but some of those cards are still hard to get out. It does have 2 spots for the cards that you use the most and those are easy to get out. Will it last as long as my last wallet, well we will have to see but it definitely costs a lot less and you get RFID protection.

评论概述: Slightly flawed, but a good concept.
评论详情: Would be a perfect minimalist soft wallet if not for a slight flaw: the edges will fray and fuzz over time. Other than the fraying issue, it's a fine wallet, it seems durable enough while remaining lightweight. The texture is grippy and feels like a slightly rubbery plastic, not unpleasant to touch. Form factor and price point are both excellent.

评论概述: Review after 3 years of every day use
评论详情: I’ve had this wallet for 3 years now and have carried it every day. I have 5 cards in one side and 4 in the other side. I don’t carry cash much but I have carried 1 spare house key inside of it the entire time. I can not find a spot anywhere where it has came apart…. It still looks pretty much new. I actually came here to buy another color and realized I forgot to write a review. It’s lightweight, doesn’t soak up water, and holds all of the items that I need it to. I carry a special ID inside of another magpul DAKA wallet on the inside of this one (the wallet that is just a vertical card holder, so my ID doesnt rub against other cards and become damaged) and it has held up as excellent.  Buy this wallet!

I'm sure it's fine as long as you don't try to put any cash in it. :P It buckles like crazy with just 10 Paper Bills.  Definitely a design flaw! It's too bad really, their other "card only" EDC wallets are great, this one just isn't.  Buy one of the other Magpul DAKA Tactical Slim Minimalist unisex-adult Polymer Credit Card Holder EDC Travel Wallets instead. :)

The build quality is excellent. I had one for two years and it looked brand new the entire time. Very sturdy and it nice, as well as extremely slim. I bought this item some years back, and I had no problems until it was stolen over the holidays. The replacement I got had some fraying at the edges, which my first wallet did not experience. When I called customer service about it, it was the most no-hassle experience ever. They got some info, and then said they are sending me a replacement. Prompt and understanding. It was the shortest and best experience with a customer service issue of my life. I was bummed that the replacement's lining was fraying, but given the customer service experience, and the prior wallet's superb performance, this product is 5/5 stars. It's worth your money, I promise.

This has been my edc wallet for about a year and a half. It's been wet. It's been through the washer, thrown in the console of my truck, left in the truck in hot weather and cold. It still looks like it did the day I got it. I don't see any signs of the layers separating or stretching. No fading of the color. I don't know what else I could ask from a wallet.
It's an interesting wallet. It wasn't for me. The material felt slippery when folded. Didn't hold cards in a way I cared for.

评论概述: Does not fit to UAH or EUR bills
评论详情: Does not fit to UAH or EUR bills. Normally closes only with 5-6 bills inside.

Great wallet as far as I can tell but I definitely ordered the gray one and I got a black one. Not really a big enough deal to go through sending it back and not having a wallet for the meantime so I guess I’ll keep it.
Small and minimalist.  Perfect.
Perfect if you sweat at work

评论概述: Three month review - pretty good so far, would order again.
评论详情: I got this on the recommendation of the EDC community. The material feels kind of rubbery, but nice. Slips into my pocket smoothly and I love it as a slim wallet. It is definitely not for anyone looking to carry more than 3-4 paper bills at a time, but that is fine for me as I almost exclusively do not carry cash. The only odd thing about it is that it's constantly spouting fibers from the side. When I opened the package it had some already. I trimmed them down with a razor but they keep coming back. It's not a game breaking problem - but just a little strange. If they weren't there when I opened the package I would have thought they were from my pocket but they are in fact coming from the wallet.
Won't hold much and is not easy to use

The wallet ID made of some vinyl or plastic product that provides zero ability for bills to move with the wallet as you fold in half.  You know those wallets that have that more silky fabric in the bill pocket, yea, that's what this needs.  Resists folding in half.....

评论概述: Well… it’s not really a thin wallet.
评论详情: It seems well made and durable. Great price, but it’s just not really that thin of a wallet. It’s a rather thick and stiff rubber material.

评论概述: Would buy a new one if needed, but I won't have to
评论详情: Very durable, and the perfect compact size for anyone trying to lower the weight on their EDC items. I was tired of having a bulky wallet as well as all of the other items I carry with me every single day, and this was an easy choice to make. Half of the time you don't even realize you have it on you which is great (but also makes me think I lost my wallet a bit). It's not going to hold a ton of cash, cards and your whole family photo book but that's the point. 10/10 would recommend.

I like the wallet a lot.  I gave five stars for durability but that can/will be re-visited after I've used if for some time.  I really like the design and happy with the purchase even though I ordered the Stealth Gray and received Black.

I have been looking for a minimalist wallet to replace my leather bi-fold. This was the one. I currently have 3 cards on each side and it works well. You could get 4 cards each side with no problem, but the wallet will not lay flat. This is not a problem when you put the wallet in your pocket. Unlike a leather wallet this one flexs if you keep it in your back pocket and sit down. It doesn't feel like a brick when you sit down. It is a minimalist wallet so I'm not sure why you would put 4-5 cards on each side. I've read that these have lasted for a year or more. That's fine be me. I will definitely by again.
its good

I used to carry those trifold style wallets after giving up the bifold with the plastic credit card holders which tore after a few months of daily use. Within a year, all prior wallets would begin to look worn or just plain ratty. After experimenting with  few of the new minimalist wallets I settled on trying this one.  Well, it's been my daily wallet for 3 years and it looks brand spanking new! I usually have anywhere from 8-15 bills and 6-8 cards in it and take cards in and out multiple times a day. Zero visible wear,  zero stretching.  I also throw my phone in the pocket with this wallet (in a hard plastic case) daily and the exterior of the wallet shows zero wear as well. I no longer worry about having an old, worn, dirty looking wallet and never lose any cards from torn or loose card pockets.  I honestly don't even consider changing wallets anymore.  Fantastic wallet and most importantly,  one less thing I need to think about replacing.

评论概述: Minimalist EDC wallet that grips to your pocket
评论详情: This wallet is really nice because the material has a slight texture that allows it to stay in your pocket yet your can pull it out without snagging. I lead an active lifestyle so sometimes my clothes get saturated in sweat and water, but the wallet itself doesn’t absorb moisture, and stays looking new. I like that it holds relatively a lot of cards and some bills for its size it is compact enough to place in my front pocket without printing. I choose this wallet over more expensive wallets, this wallet is nice. I don’t care if I’m dressed ruggedly or wearing nice clothes, this stays on me. Thanks Magpul for developing this wallet and offering it at an affordable price point.
Clean, minimalistic and streamline. Good/sturdy material. Holds everything yet still stays slim.

评论概述: A product of the PRC that works well.
评论详情: This is a solid wallet, good color, well made, but I returned it.  I took away a star because MAGPUL products are made in the USA except for this one, which I only discovered after getting it because it didn't state the country of origin, as every product ought to.

评论概述: Awesome, light, comfortable and no nonsense.
评论详情: Awesome, light, comfortable and no nonsense.

I originally purchased the Fidelo slim wallet that lets you eject cards for use, and loved it. However, the sharp corner ended up wearing a hole in my slacks.  I settled on the Magpul DAKA Bifold as a replacement. It is very lightweight, and has held up well over the past few months, with no more holes in my pants. I carry 8 credit-card sized items, a thin insurance card and an extra folded $50. Everything fits easily, with plenty of room for cash in the larger compartment.  Some observations:  The wallet flops closed when you set it down. This is plus in my book.  It is not RFID blocking, and I can store my work badge in the cash slot.  It holds a reasonable amount of cash, without requiring it to be folded multiple times.  Each side of the wallet has two slots for cards, a skinny one-card slot on top, and the wider multi-card slot beneath it. It is NOT easy to slide a card out of the top slot, nor is it easy to quickly return it. I ended up putting my primary card in the bottom of the lower slot. It is easier to get the card out, and much easier to return the card. However, I would have preferred that this card be in the top slot.

ive gone through tons of wallets, this one is very very slim. however the material its made of is sticky like rubber, until you break it in you might have trouble getting your cards and cash in and out

评论概述: Great, slim wallet, for ease of use.
评论详情: The wallet comes with many slots and a pouch available to hold cash and still remain completely slim and comfortable in the front or back pocket of your pants, the material it is made out of is durable and the fact that it's made by MagPul is even cooler.
Great for minimalist who doesn’t want to car a card holder!

评论概述: it does what it says it does
评论详情: this is what my wallet looks like 2 1/2 years after I purchased it on amazon. I'm just a suburban civilian that doesn't get dirty much, but the wallet looks and feels exactly like the day I received it. amazon suggested the DAKA Everyday, it piqued my interest, & reminded me of the Magpul Bifold I already use everyday. I'm really satisfied, the wallet is super rugged, and one day I may part with another $25 to get the Everyday. Until then, I'm cool with the Bifold mostly bc its CASH centered wallet.

Really dope wallet! I bought this because my last wallet got chewed up by my dog. I watched some YouTube videos about the wallet and I decided to buy. It is the slimmest wallet I’ve ever owned and it fits litterally all of my cards perfectly but is slimmer than any other wallet I’ve had. Personally I think this is a solid wallet
Ligera e ideal para guardar lo esencial: billetes, documentos de identidad y tarjetas de crédito.

Just picked this up. Seemed like a great slim wallet option that allows me to carry bills that are not clipped in or held by a rubber band. Here are my observations.  1) Love the material and the texture, feels very durable. Would 100% survive a ride in the washing machine. 2) Fits 6 cards nicely, but starts getting some folding issues. 3) Carries 5 bills nicely, but starts having folding issues above 6. 4) 4 cards + 5 bills seems to be the max before folding issues occur. 5) Small strands of fiber can be seen along the welded edges, a quick pass with a lighter takes care of it. 6) The material grips denim well keeping it secure in my jeans.  So far so good. Ill update as I carry it more.  The photos included both have 4 cards. The nicely closed picture has 4 bills in it, the open one has 8. With time I am sure it will break in and wont have folding issues.
Awesome small minimalistic wallet that is durable and aesthetically pleasing. Would definitely buy again

Don’t get me wrong it’s a great wallet. I picked the OD green one because I like the color. It’s comfortable,slim,and not as bulky as your traditional wallet. HOWEVER…. You can’t carry more than 5 bills including cards without the wallet beginning to bulge and open itself. The quality isn’t that great. It has a kydex feel which is cool but I keep finding myself burning the frays off it at least every month. With that being said I would say it’s worth it

评论概述: 3 years later and it’s finally ready to give up
评论详情: I purchased this in October 2019, I’ve used it continually and it’s been really great. It’s starting to delaminate in a more serious way now and it’s time for a replacement. I love the thinness, the light weight and it can hold a fair amount of stuff. I’ve been happy with it, for 25 bucks can’t go wrong.

评论概述: Gets frizzy around the edges and looks bad after a short time
评论详情: I’ve had the wallet for a few months and the edges get all frayed quickly.  Big time design flaw.  Otherwise it’s fine.
The product is lightweight and minimalist alright. But it's uncomfortable to pull cards out side ways. Leather (smooth) wallets are larger yes, but they are more comfortable.
Great wallet! I like how slim it is and how lightweight it is compared to other billfold wallets I've had. The material seems tough and like it will last. No more sitting on a fat wallet!
This wallet could handle mud wrestling and come clean easily
This wallet is for the minimalist person. Id, few other cards and few bills of cash. That’s it. I’m a pretty minimal person but this wallet wudnt even close for my stuff.
After about 3 years it still looks brand new very durable construction perfect for the outdoorsman. Ive been in the rain, hot summer days traveling and such would recommend 10/10

评论概述: Slim, trim, holds what i need it to.
评论详情: My new wallet.  I will rebuy it if needed.  Perfect slim wallet.  Hold the essentials.
Slim wallet. Initially the card holders are a bit tight but it’s loosened up a bit over the last month. Smart looking wallet.

评论概述: Great wallet, but won't last very long
评论详情: Awesome wallet, does everything I expected, small, slim and perfectly sized for my use. I'm coming up on 2 years of using this thing, and it's falling apart, unfortunately. The material is separating, or "delaminating", as it's made from multiple layers. A bit unfortunate, I had hope for more durability out of it. For the price and how well it works, I'll get another one.

Went from a leather bifold wallet that was thick, to this. I used to take my wallet out while driving or sitting for a while, now it doesn't even feel like anything is in my back pocket. Fits: Drivers License, Debit Card, Credit Card, Business Credit Card, CPL, Hunting and fishing license, and a couple of bills.

Magpul makes good solid price competitive gear. This is fine example. Like many personal items though, if it isn't comfortable in use it won't be used. The edges are near sharp. The slots are stiff enough to require two hands to remove cards. The fold feels like it wants to push my pocket open. Maybe for another it will be a fine long wearing minimal wallet. Not me.

评论概述: Mostly good, fills my need in a wallet.
评论详情: I tried 3 Magpul wallets to try and find a replacement for my front pocket wallet that was nearing the end of its life, but served me well. I thought I had found the perfect solution, unfortunately all of them were too tight to be functional, at least conveniently functional. With as little as a few bills folded it was difficult to use, and the cards weren't even maxed out. Then I tried this one, with the bi-fold, and although it was a little thicker than I wanted, it made up for it in usability and still thin enough for my needs. It seems durable and is not showing any signs of wear after a couple weeks. My only minor gripe is that it doesn't sit flat and wants to lay partially open when on my night stand. Not a deal breaker, but I hope it wears in over time and lays more flat, it is a small issue when in my pocket as well.

评论概述: I liked it more than I thought I ever could.
评论详情: The magpul daka wallet was a great choice I recently switched to. I carry cash from tips but don’t want a bulge in my pocket. The wallet has a harder time with a lot of bills but it will still fold and stay flat when in a pocket. The grey is nice too! This is a good wallet for someone wanting a slimmer wallet but still wants to keep cash regularly.
I love small, minimalist thin wallets and this is it! Well made and designed for the minimalist! Will update after some time
A+
Doesn't fold easily with multiple credit cards.

Very small.  Made me cut back on what I carry, but I could carry more if I wanted.  When I need to catty more I can squeeze the items in.  Does take some time to pull out cards, money and go to put back in.
Excellent wallet, water proof, comfortable in rear pocket, while sitting, and has good room for cards.
Carries the basics. LOS profile. No fuss. Wears well

评论概述: Falls apart in less than 6 months.
评论详情: Falls apart.
This is not a wallet,but a piece  of rubber folded together.In addition the description is bogus.

评论概述: Dont buy unless your using it for going out to dinner or maybe fishing
评论详情: Product is to small for cash and id, credit cards, debt cards, and  cards. Its built for a 12 year old kid

The wallet is a slim design and good for what it is.  It doesn't handle many bills, but it can carry a few cards.  Unfortunately not even a whole year of light to moderate use and it's starting to peel away and with some ease.  I've been buying Magpul products since 2008 and this is unfortunately not one of their better items.  All in all it serves it's purpose
Great wallet. Durable and thin
It’s hard to put money in and won’t shut if you have more than 2 or 3 bills in it. Hopin if I fill it full and put heavy stuff on it it will break in.
I bought it as a replacement for my older Magpul wallet. I one I got is from china, I thought all Magpul products are made in the USA.
It’s magpul, what can I say
Was skeptical at first as it was super tight, and stiff. After a few months, it has broken in slowly, to make its smoother for EDC use. Perfect size for minimalist EDC.

评论概述: Very slim, but too grippy of material
评论详情: I like how slim it is, and it definitely reduces comfort/back problems from sitting on a thick wallet.  the rubbery plastic material is very grippy though. It pulls the pockets inside out if I remove it while I'm wearing any slacks or pants with thin lined pockets.  it also grips on money as well. so it can be difficult to stuff bills into it. especially if it is part way full.
My husband is very wallet picky.  He loves this one.  Carries it every day, great quality.
The wallet does what it needs to and does not hinder me in any way. I'd say it was worth it.

评论概述: Best wallet I've had in years
评论详情: I typically go through a leather based wallet every year for how fast they deteriorate.  I bought this wallet nearly two years ago and is only now showing wear and layer separation.  It still has quite a bit of life in it.  I agree with comments that bills will protrude if you have too many, but that's usually not an issue for me.  Will definitely buy again.

Low profile, light, durable.  It fits 4 credit cards on one side 2 forms of identification and a fishing license on the other, and still has room for 4 bills in the money pocket. Although I have fit 20 bills in it but it was snug. All in all a good wallet!

I absolutely love this wallet. Super thin and lightweight. Holds all my cards tightly. I currently have 13 cards in my wallet. It appears as though it could hold a few more. But It isn't the wallet for you if you have a store card for every place you ever go.
Very thin. Great for a few bills, a couple credit cards and the drivers license. No more bulky wallet.

评论概述: Nice, but doesn’t hold a lot.
评论详情: You can’t fit a whole lot in the wallet. However, it does stay relatively slim. I think it would be a better product if the interior could stretch a little more, allowing more card and/or cash.

It's a very solid wallet, but you can't put more than 2 or 3 bills (make sure they're crisp or good luck getting them in without the corners folding up) and a few cards. Once you hit about 4 bills it won't sit flat anymore.  Also I'd argue the card slots need to be cut a millimeter or two wider, as it can be frustrating to have the cards keep catching as you're trying to put them back in. It's a difficult balance between too small and too large, I feel it's just a touch small if you use your cards frequently.  I thought it would loosen up as I sat on it or used it, but it seems no less stiff than when I got it after several weeks of use and keeping weight on it when not in use.  Also noticed a few threads starting to fray from the edge but I'm guessing that won't go far.  I'm not a minimalist when it comes to having cash on hand and I have to carry 3 key cards and a minimum of 3 credit cards, so I had my doubts to begin with. I was encouraged by some reviews but I knew it was likely too small.  I do like that I can sit on it for at least short drives without hurting my sciatic nerve or back, but I wish they'd make a little larger version for those who need to carry more (otherwise it just becomes not having the denomination or card you need, or carrying an additional billfold, etc. - binder clips make the best billfolds/money clips for those who go this route.)  Overall it's okay, but not my favorite wallet. Would only recommend to pure minimalists. I love magpul though, including the daka pouches, and the durability is absolutely a plus.

评论概述: Right wallet for the right person.
评论详情: Doesn’t fit bill or more than 5 cards.  Great quality and very durable for the lighter traveler.  Would recommend for those individuals.

评论概述: Magpul is great just like a Pmag A+++++++
评论详情: love this slim wallet! got this for my vacation. Even went swimming with it.

评论概述: Falls apart over time but warranty is excellent
评论详情: A little over a year of owning this wallet, I'm getting some severe delamination of the layers of the wallet. This has also happened to a cardholder.  Both times, Magpul sent out free replacements free of charge after filling out the contact form with a few pictures.
